channel.title: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
channel.description:
> The Lurker, Neutral, Social :speech_balloon: > = > This class is a unique class and will become evil king if elected > > Passive 1: Royal Blood: same as normal royal blood > > Passive 2: Magic Barrier: immune to death once and immune to poison/bleeding > > Day Ability 1: Spy: see all whispers to and from king, 2 use > > Day Ability 2: Lurk: same as maid spy, unlimited uses > > Night Ability: Uncover: find out if a player is an unseen/cult/BD/neut/NK if you find an unseen/cult/NK they will discover who you are. > > Goal: live to see the BD and the watchful guard destroyed
> Credit goes to Unknown for the Watchful Guard, I changed somethings around a bit, if you want to see his original one it is on comment 8 > > The Watchful Guard (name may change), Neutral, Offensive > = > The Watchful Guard is a unique class > > Passive 1: Rusty Armour: immune to death once > > Passive 2: Untouchable: immune to poison/bleeding, occupation, and target change > > Day Ability 1: Looking at You: you're target can't look at whispers, unlimited uses > > Night Ability 1: Spy Removal Service: kill somebody if they are a lurker, a noble, an aristocrat, or an apostle, goes through night immunity, 1 use > > Night Ability 2: Don't You Dare: if your target is being targeted by a lurker, sheriff/paladin, marshal, Seeker, noble, aristocrat or apostle, prevent the visit and identify them. > > Goal: Live to see the lurker destroyed and prevent an unseen/cult win
feedback/suggestions would be appreciated

item.title: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
How about this…

The Watchful Guard (Neutral Support)
Passive 1:Rusty Armor:Immune to death the first two nights
Day Ability 1:Keeping an Eye on you: Your target cannot look into whispers(Unlimited Uses)
Night Ability1: No Spies!(1 use) Kill somebody if they are a Lurker, Noble, Aristocrat or Apostle. Pierces Night Immunity.
Night Ability 2: This does not belong to you!(unlimited uses)If your target is being targeted by a Lurker, Sheriff, Paladin, Marshal, Seeker, Noble, Aristocrat or Apostle, prevent the visit and identify them. If you prevent a visit of an identified person, you kill them, piercing night immunity.
Win Condition:Live to see the Lurker die and prevent an Unseen or Cult victory.

Converted Classes:
Nightwatch? and Ritualist

Read full topic

item.title: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
Don’t get me wrong, Im not against the fact that it can harm the BD, the problem is that it sides with the unseen and directly helps them, unlike other neutrals that harm the BD like Fool or Scorned whose goals are more selfish.

Read full topic
item.source: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,

item.title: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Ty for the suggestions

psychoneirik:

This is the first problem, this neutral class is basically an extra unseen member, similar to the sorcerer, but to offset this the sorcerer has a direct counter.

Hmm… only problem is that if it wasn’t against the BD, then seeing there whispers is not going to solve the problem, maybe make the goal is to live to see the king dead?

psychoneirik:

4 uses is too strong, I think you should lower it to 2 uses instead.

okay I will change it to 2

Read full topic
item.source: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,

item.title: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
I like the idea but I think there are some problems with it, first of all:

Goal: live to see the BD destroyed

This is the first problem, this neutral class is basically an extra unseen member, similar to the sorcerer, but to offset this the sorcerer has a direct counter.

Day Ability 1: Spy: see all whispers to and from king, 4 use

4 uses is too strong, I think you should lower it to 2 uses instead.

Read full topic
item.source: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,

item.title: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
The Lurker, Neutral, Social

This class is a unique class and will become evil king if elected

Passive 1: Royal Blood: same as normal royal blood

Passive 2: Magic Barrier: immune to death once and immune to poison/bleeding

Day Ability 1: Spy: see all whispers to and from king, 2 use

Day Ability 2: Lurk: same as maid spy, unlimited uses

Night Ability: Uncover: find out if a player is an unseen/cult/BD/neut/NK if you find an unseen/cult/NK they will discover who you are.

Goal: live to see the BD and the watchful guard destroyed

Credit goes to Unknown for the Watchful Guard, I changed somethings around a bit, if you want to see his original one it is on comment 8

The Watchful Guard (name may change), Neutral, Offensive

The Watchful Guard is a unique class

Passive 1: Rusty Armour: immune to death once

Passive 2: Untouchable: immune to poison/bleeding, occupation, and target change

Day Ability 1: Looking at You: you’re target can’t look at whispers, unlimited uses

Night Ability 1: Spy Removal Service: kill somebody if they are a lurker, a noble, an aristocrat, or an apostle, goes through night immunity, 1 use

Night Ability 2: Don’t You Dare: if your target is being targeted by a lurker, sheriff/paladin, marshal, Seeker, noble, aristocrat or apostle, prevent the visit and identify them.

Goal: Live to see the lurker destroyed and prevent an unseen/cult win

feedback/suggestions would be appreciated

Read full topic
item.source: The Lurker, neutral, social, a class that may help the new king meta,
